titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the speedy raising and leavying of monyes for the advance and mainteinance of the forces now sent forth for this present expedition from the cities of London, Westminster, and liberties thereof, borough of Southwarke, hamblets of the tower and the parishes mentioned in the weekly bills of mortality.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: "Finis" on p. 8 is followed by a catchword "Dic" ; the t.p. calls for no additional material.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
